title: Pixel 3 XL owner, Can't redeem 100G extra storage .
content:
I owned a google pixel 3 XL, then it got stolen, and now I bought another one.
So basically I own 2 pixel 3 XLs registered under my name.

I know that as a google pixel 3 XL owner I am eligible of redeeming extra 100G storage on my google drive for free.
In fact, my husband also owns a google pixel 3 XL himself, and he received this email for redeeming the extra 100G.

Can anyone PLEASE suggest how can I reddem the 100G storage on my account?
Is it maybe possible to ask google for this 'redeem' email once again?

Thanx a lot! 
Alex
